sources.title: A Shriek in the Night
sources.description: A madman shrieks as the body of a man falls from an upper floor of an apartment building, bringing unwanted attention from a rival reporter to a racketeering case an undercover reporter is investigating. Stars: Ginger Rogers and Lyle Talbot IMDb Page The 665MB MPEG4 file was derived from the 1.7GB MPEG2 found on this page .

sources.title: A Shriek in the Night (1933)
sources.description: Rival newspaper reporters Pat Morgan and Ted Rand find themselves unraveling the mystery behind the death of a millionaire philanthropist who fell from his penthouse balcony. When it is discovered that the plunge was not an accident, the building's residents come under suspicion. Soon, the body count begins to mount as three more murders occur by strangulation. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/a-shriek-in-the-night-1933/

sources.title: A Shriek in the Night
sources.description: A man falls to his death from the balcony of his penthouse apartment. Two reporters fighting over the scoop start to uncover a sinister plot. You can find out more about this film on its IMDB page .

sources.title: A Shriek in the Night (1933) GINGER ROGERS
sources.description:
Stars: Ginger Rogers, Lyle Talbot, Harvey Clark 
 Director: Albert Ray

 Rival newspaper reporters join forces to solve a series of murders!

sources.title: A Shriek in the Night (1933) Ginger Rogers | Crime, Mystery, Romance Movie
sources.description:
Pat Morgan and Ted Kord are rival newspaper reporters always trying to outscoop each other. They join together to solve a series of murders being committed in an apartment building.

Director: Albert Ray
Writers: Kurt Kempler
Stars: Ginger Rogers, Lyle Talbot, Harvey Clark
